response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am extending an offer to purchase this item for $950,000. This price reflects its true worth and ensures a fair transaction for both parties involved. I understand its significance to you and believe it's a fair compromise between its value to you and my asking price. I look forward to discussing the details further and potentially making this acquisition a reality. Please let me know your thoughts on this proposal.", "product_price": 950000}
